com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr

Class AbstractLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.AbstractLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDBUnitLoader, SQLLoader

    public abstract class AbstractLoader
extends Object
implements Loader
    Abstract base class for loaders that implements the Loader.isSupported(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger, com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.Source) method.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String CANNOT_VALIDATE_FILE
      The message key for the error reported when an error occurs validating a file.
      protected static String CLASSPATH_PREFIX
      The prefix used to denote that a resource should be loaded from the classpath rather than the file system.
      protected static int CLASSPATH_PREFIX_LENGTH
      The length of the classpath: prefix.

      • getExtension

        protected abstract String getExtension()
        Get the extension of the files that the loader will support.

        The file extension.

      • hasValidContent

        protected boolean hasValidContent(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger logger,
                      Source source)
        Check the contents of the file to see if it is valid for this loader.
        Parameters:
        logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
        source - The source data or script.
        Returns:
        • true if the content is valid.
        • false if the content is invalid.

      • isSupported

        public final boolean isSupported(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger logger,
                  Source source)
        Determine whether or not the data or script can be loaded or executed.
        Specified by:
        isSupported in interface Loader
        Parameters:
        logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
        source - The source file containing the data or script.
        Returns:
        • true if the data or script can be loaded or executed.
        • falseif the data or script cannot be loaded or executed.

      • isClasspath

        protected boolean isClasspath(Source source)
        Determine if data set or script source is a file system or class path resource. If the name is prefixed with classpath: then it is a class path resource.
        Parameters:
        source - The data set or script.
        Returns:
        true if the source filename is prefixed with classpath:. Otherwise, false.

      • getInputStream

        protected final InputStream getInputStream(Source source)
                                    throws IOException
        Get an input stream for the data set or script source.
        Parameters:
        source - The data set or script.
        Returns:
        An InputStream or null if the source cannot be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there was an error creating the input stream.

      • getReader

        protected final Reader getReader(Source source)
                          throws IOException
        Get a reader for the data set or script source.
        Parameters:
        source - The data set or script.
        Returns:
        A Reader or null if the source cannot be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there was an error creating the reader.
